page.title: Training Programs | CORE ATHLETE
page.description: Explore our comprehensive athletic training programs. From team training to 1-on-1 coaching, find the perfect program to elevate your performance.

programsHero.title: Training Programs
programsHero.subtitle: Science-based programs designed for every athlete and every goal. Whether you're training for your sport, building strength, or looking to improve overall athletic performance, we have a program tailored to your needs.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our Programs
benefits.subtitle: Every program is built on proven athletic training principles

benefits.title: Personalized Approach
benefits.description: Each program is customized to your sport, goals, and current fitness level. No cookie-cutter workouts.

benefits.title: Data-Driven Results
benefits.description: Track your progress with measurable metrics. See improvements in strength, speed, and overall performance.

benefits.title: Proven Track Record
benefits.description: Our programs have helped hundreds of athletes reach state championships, college scholarships, and pro contracts.

benefits.title: Expert Coaching
benefits.description: Work with certified strength coaches who have trained collegiate and professional athletes.

benefits.title: Science-Based Training
benefits.description: Every exercise and protocol is backed by sports science research and proven methodology.

benefits.title: Injury Prevention Focus
benefits.description: Build resilience and reduce injury risk through proper movement patterns and progressive loading.

methodology.title: Our Training Methodology
methodology.subtitle: A systematic approach to athletic development

phases.title: Assessment & Goal Setting
phases.description: We start with a comprehensive movement assessment and performance testing to establish your baseline and set clear, measurable goals.

phases.title: Foundation Building
phases.description: Develop proper movement patterns, core stability, and base strength. This phase prepares your body for more intense training.

phases.title: Strength & Power Development
phases.description: Build explosive power, speed, and sport-specific strength through progressive overload and varied training stimuli.

phases.title: Performance Optimization
phases.description: Fine-tune your athletic abilities with advanced techniques, speed work, and competition-specific conditioning.

programsGrid.title: Choose Your Path
programsGrid.subtitle: Find the program that matches your goals and schedule

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our programs

questions.question: What age groups do you work with?
questions.answer: We train athletes from age 8 through adult. Our Youth Programs are designed for ages 8-13, while Teen and Adult programs cater to ages 14+. Each program is age-appropriate and follows proper developmental guidelines.

questions.question: Do I need prior training experience?
questions.answer: No prior experience is necessary. We work with athletes at all levels, from beginners to elite competitors. Every program starts with an assessment to determine your current level and create an appropriate training plan.

questions.question: How long does it take to see results?
questions.answer: Most athletes notice improvements in strength and conditioning within 3-4 weeks. Significant performance gains typically appear after 8-12 weeks of consistent training. Results vary based on training frequency, effort, and individual factors.

questions.question: What equipment do I need?
questions.answer: All equipment is provided at our facility. We have everything from Olympic lifting platforms to sleds, medicine balls, resistance bands, and sport-specific training tools. Just bring athletic shoes and water.

questions.question: Can I try a session before committing?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer a free trial session so you can experience our training firsthand. This includes a brief assessment, sample workout, and consultation with our coaches. Book through our contact page.

questions.question: What's your cancellation policy?
questions.answer: We require 24-hour notice for cancellations. Sessions cancelled with less than 24 hours notice will be charged. We understand emergencies happen and handle these on a case-by-case basis.

questions.question: Do you offer team discounts?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer special rates for sports teams and groups of 6 or more athletes training together. Contact us for custom team packages and pricing.

questions.question: How do you track progress?
questions.answer: We use a combination of performance testing, body composition analysis, video analysis, and strength metrics. You'll receive regular progress reports showing improvements in key performance indicators relevant to your goals.

comparison.title: Program Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Compare features and find the best fit

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.subtitle: Book a free trial session and experience the CORE ATHLETE difference.
